sentences: Võttes selle ettepaneku vastu, me alustame uut projekti.
Võttes aega otsustamiseks, saavutas parema tulemuse.
Tüdruk võtas raamatu kätte ja avas esimese lehe.
context: The Estonian word 'võttes' is the elative case of the verb 'võtma', which means 'to take'. In this form, it functions as an adverbial participle expressing the manner or condition in which an action occurs. It can be translated into English as 'taking', 'by taking', or 'with', depending on context.
